briefdescription.para: This is the character array that is used to get the appropriate character encoding for a given character value.

detaileddescription.para: This uses a whitelisting method. 0xValue means the value is a hex.

briefdescription.para: Checks if the gven character is a base64 character.

detaileddescription.para: Return true if CH is a character from the Base64 alphabet, and false otherwise. Note that '=' is padding and not considered to be part of the alphabet.

parameterdescription.para: - The character to verify as base64

simplesect.para: true - if the given character passes the test for base64. false if the test fails

briefdescription.para: ESAPICBase64EncoderEncode - This function is used to encode a given inputString and return the string operation.

parameterdescription.para: - The given string to be encoded

simplesect.para: The output of the string operation.-> The encoded string.

inbodydescription.para: < Could be low on memory so a very short desc is used

briefdescription.para: ESAPICBase64EncoderDecode - This function is used to decode a given inputString and return the string operation.

parameterdescription.para: - The given string to be decoded

simplesect.para: The output of the string operation.-> The decoded string.

inbodydescription.para: < Could be low on memory so a very short desc is used
